description: This walk takes you around the Knott Hill Nature Reserve in Tameside, Greater Manchester. The reserve includes a pretty lake surrounded by peaceful woodland. There's nice footpaths with lots of flora and fauna to see including butterflies and great spotted woodpecker. The reserve lies just to the south of Hartshead Pike. To extend the walk you could climb the hill for some fine views over the area.
display_address: Ashton-under-Lyne Golf Club, Gorsey Lane, Springs, Ashton-under-Lyne, Tameside, Greater Manchester, England, OL6 9HT, United Kingdom
